com.samsung.spen.lib.input

Class SPenEventLibrary

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.spen.lib.input.SPenEventLibrary

  • public class SPenEventLibrary
extends java.lang.Object
    The SPenEventLibrary class. This is the class to handle overall event processing for S Pen.
    Since:
    S-Pen SDK 2.2

      • setSPenHoverIcon

        public boolean setSPenHoverIcon(Context context,
                       View view,
                       int hoverIconType)
        The settings for the hover icon displayed on the hover event related to S Pen.
        Parameters:
        context - Context object
        view - View for hover event registration
        hoverIconType - Icon type to display for hover
        - HOVERING_SPENICON_DEFAULT, HOVERING_SPENICON_CURSOR, HOVERING_SPENICON_SPLIT_01, HOVERING_SPENICON_SPLIT_02, HOVERING_SPENICON_MOVE, HOVERING_SPENICON_RESIZE_01, HOVERING_SPENICON_RESIZE_02, HOVERING_SPENICON_RESIZE_03, HOVERING_SPENICON_RESIZE_04
        Returns:
        Result of settings for hover icon
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.2

      • setSPenCustomHoverIcon

        public boolean setSPenCustomHoverIcon(Context context,
                             View view,
                             Drawable customHoverIcon)
        The settings for the custom hover icon displayed on the hover event related to S Pen.
        Parameters:
        context - Context object
        view - View for hover event registration
        customHoverIcon - custom icon to display for hover
        Returns:
        Result of hover icon settings for custom icon
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.2

      • setSPenHoverListener

        public boolean setSPenHoverListener(Context context,
                           View view,
                           SPenHoverListener listener,
                           int hoverIconType)
        The settings for the listener and hover icon that are called upon detecting S Pen-related hover events.
        Parameters:
        context - Context object
        view - View for hover event registration
        listener - The SPenHoverListener listener to register
        hoverIconType - Icon type to display for hover
        - HOVERING_SPENICON_DEFAULT, HOVERING_SPENICON_CURSOR, HOVERING_SPENICON_SPLIT_01, HOVERING_SPENICON_SPLIT_02, HOVERING_SPENICON_MOVE, HOVERING_SPENICON_RESIZE_01, HOVERING_SPENICON_RESIZE_02, HOVERING_SPENICON_RESIZE_03, HOVERING_SPENICON_RESIZE_04
        Returns:
        Result of hover icon settings for custom icon
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.2

      • setSPenCustomHoverListener

        public boolean setSPenCustomHoverListener(Context context,
                                 View view,
                                 SPenHoverListener listener,
                                 Drawable customHoverIcon)
        The settings for the listener and custom hover icon that are called upon detecting S Pen-related hover events.
        Parameters:
        context - Context object
        view - View for hover event registration
        listener - The SPenHoverListener listener to register
        customHoverIcon - Resource of icon to display for hover
        Returns:
        Result of hover icon settings for custom icon
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.2

      • registerSPenDetachmentListener

        public boolean registerSPenDetachmentListener(Context context,
                                     SPenDetachmentListener listener)
        Sets a callback listener for SPenDetachmentListener. To release memory for SPen Detatchment, the activity must call unregisterSPenDetachmentListener() when the is is about to finish(onDestroy()).
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        listener - The callback listener for SPenDetachmentListener
        Returns:
        True for success. False for failure.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.2

      • unregisterSPenDetachmentListener

        public boolean unregisterSPenDetachmentListener(Context context)
        Sets a callback listener for SPenDetachmentListener.
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        Returns:
        True for success. False for failure.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.2
